subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: Your subject knowledge statement failed to convey your passion for your chosen subject.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: You must get a reference from the primary school or the supply agency you are currently working for.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: As you are currently employed  at least one of your references must be from your current employer.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Unfortunately you do not meet our entry requirements. Applicants for the Computer Science course are required to have either a degree in Computer Science or an A Level of grade C or above in Computer Science.
